channel.title: -= NeeD HeLp With Runserver.bat =-
channel.description:
Probelm: cant get runserver to work prop'erly
In compile i get this:
Note: steam.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. note: recompile with -xlint:deprecation for details. press any key to continue . . .
Is it supposed to do that i take it , it is but ? then i compile i continue and then when i go to runserver i get this error:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.unsupportedclassversionerror: bad version number in .class file at java.langclassloader.defineclass1<native method> at java.lang.classloader.defineclass>unknown source> at java.net.URLclassloader.defineclass<unkownsource> (about an other 5-7 errors/more of these whatever these mean) press any key to continue . . .
So erm can u please help me how to fix this ? (this happens in most sources i got however) also when my compilier comes up with (this happens in other 1s like testscape)
client.java:4912 ';' expected clearquestinterface<>
1 error press any ken to continue . . .
And runserver works fine with this source however i cant get it to work in other sources so i need help in fixing it.
Can some Please help thx ;)

item.title: -= NeeD HeLp With Runserver.bat =-
item.dc:creator: @I3airdy I3airdy
item.description:
@I3airdy wrote:

well i got that code of “mod taharok” and my runserver.bat worked perfectly fine before i compiled but after i compiled it didnt work mod taharok says i should use this code not that 1 =S and that 1 does’nt even work any way least i think it doesnt , still needing help plx.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 01:55:16 PM[/size][hr]defitly does not work with the code u gave me cant even find the patch specified =S

still needing help , might not get help till mod taharok comes on which probly be like tomoz lol =(

well if any one can help plx do so

Read full topic

item.title: -= NeeD HeLp With Runserver.bat =-
item.dc:creator: @iceman21 iceman21
item.description:
@iceman21 wrote:

where exactly did you get that code…and maybe the problem is in your compiler not yure runserver cause thats what i have…change your info in your compile to this and see if it works:

@echo off COLOR 04 title ServerNameHere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause and try changeing JDK1.5.0_09 to wahtevr u have such as:

@echo off COLOR 04 title Mortalscape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause like that

Read full topic

item.title: -= NeeD HeLp With Runserver.bat =-
item.dc:creator: @I3airdy I3airdy
item.description:
@I3airdy wrote:

Ive got jdk 6 lol anyhow in my runserver.bat i have

@echo off
title Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

Yet after i compile i does’nt work =S comes up with errors i posted =S ?

Need more help…
